title: Jess Phillips – 2023 Comments After Commons Report Published that Boris Johnson Knowingly Lied to Parliament
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jess Phillips, the Labour MP for Birmingham Yardley, on Twitter on 15 June 2023.
content:
Just want to give some respect to the members of the privileges committee. They have been put through the ringer,lied about, attempts at intimidation. They have had their security put at risk. It might seem like names on a piece of paper but they are people who serve the people.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
